column2:
```r
# read petripez bulk dataset
load('~/omnideconv/data/petiprez_data/petiprez_FACS_fractions.RData')
petri_facs <- facs_mMCPcounter
petri_facs$sample_name <- rownames(petri_facs)
petri_counts <- fread('~/omnideconv/data/petiprez_data/salmon.merged.gene_counts.tsv')
petri_tpm <- fread('~/omnideconv/data/petiprez_data/salmon.merged.gene_tpm.tsv')
petri_meta <- fread('~/omnideconv/data/petiprez_data/samplesheet.txt')
petri_meta <- unique(merge(x=petri_meta[,c('Source Name','Comment[ENA_EXPERIMENT]')], y=petri_facs, by.x='Source Name', by.y='sample_name', all.y=T))
colnames(petri_meta)[which(colnames(petri_meta)=='Comment[ENA_EXPERIMENT]')] <- 'sample_id'
petri_meta$`Source Name`<- NULL
rownames(petri_counts) <- petri_counts$id
rownames(petri_tpm) <- petri_tpm$id
petri_counts$gene_id <- NULL
petri_counts$gene_name <- NULL
petri_tpm$gene_id <- NULL
petri_tpm$gene_name <- NULL


```
